youtube.title: The Science Behind a Blown Vein: Wrong Injection Explained
youtube.description: Discover the biological process of what happens when an injection is incorrectly administered through a vein. This 3D animation shows the formation of a hematoma and why bruising occurs after a missed IV or injection. Learn human anatomy and medical science easily!
